about.title: About the Project
about.description: This project is a time capsule for your memories. Send memories to yourself and your loved ones in the future!

spoiler.text: This site is a pet project developed by Barannikov Maxim (tg:@PureLeach). The main goal of the project is to independently go through all stages of web application development: from design and code writing to frontend and backend integration and successful deployment to hosting. Since the project was developed alone with limited resources and time, bugs may occur on the site. If you notice bugs, please report them through the feedback form - it will help me to make the project better. Also I will be glad to receive any feedback and suggestions for improvement. The source code for the entire application is publicly available at GitHub. Thank you for your attention and support!
